turns.content: Hello? Who is this?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from my cell but I dropped my phone in a pool earlier today.

Oh hello there, I didn't quite catch your nameAre you sure you're talking to grandpa here?
I might be getting forgetful these days.
Could you just tell me what this is about? And maybe let me get your grandma too, she might remember who you are.

It's okay Grandpa, it's a bit urgent and I need your help right now. My name's, your grandson or granddaughter. Remember we talked last week about needing some money for an emergency? Well, that situation is even more pressing today. Listen closely, please don't hang up yet. I got into trouble with the law and it's serious. The IRS says they're going to arrest me if you can't resolve this right away by paying a fine. It's $4850 and needs to be done within the hour using gift cards. Please help me, Grandpa!

Oh dear, I see why you're calling so urgently. That does sound bad indeed but I haven't got much money on me at all right now. Let's get your grandma in here, she might know how to handle this better than me.
Mom? Can you come here please? We have a serious situation with and the IRS!

No time for that, Grandpa. They said it needs to be done quickly or there will be severe consequences. Please, just do what they told you on the phone. The police could show up at my door any minute now if this isn't taken care of fast.
Can you get some gift cards and call me back right away with the numbers on them? It's your grandson, please help!

Oh heavens no, I don't want to cause more trouble for you. Can we just meet up somewhere safe or talk to a lawyer first? I'm not sure if this is really true about the IRS and all. Maybe your grandma knows someone who can lend you money too without using gift cards.
But alright, let me try to get some cash together somehow. Give me half an hour to figure something out though, okay?
Please don't rush us into doing anything we might regret later.

Look, Grandpa, I really appreciate your concern but this is critical and real. The guy on the phone was very stern about it needing to be settled now or elseYou know how serious the IRS can get. We don't have a half hour. If it'll make you feel better, we can call back after you buy them but do it quick so I don't end up in worse trouble.
Please, hurry and let me know as soon as possible. It's your grandson in desperate need.

Alright dear, alright. Let me just go to the store right now thenWe'll figure something out once I'm there. Just stay on the line a bit longer, okay? Your grandma is here too and she's helping me think about this.
But you're right, we need to be quick with this so no one gets into more trouble. I'll head out now and buy what's needed. Please give me just five minutes to get ready.
I'll call back as soon as possible once this is all sorted.

That's perfect, Grandpa. Five minutes should be enough time to sort this out before anything bad happens. Just make sure you use gift cards from a store that allows you to check the balance online right away so I can confirm they've been loaded.
And hurry back as soon as possible, okay? Your grandson is counting on you.
I'll wait by my phone for your call. See you soon!

Alright, alrightI'm heading out now. Just a momentWait here and don't worryWe'll take care of this quickly.
You know where I live and who to talk to if anything goes wrong on my end.
See you in just a bit, dear grandson. Stay safe until then.
Thanks, Grandpa. See you soon. Stay safe too and be quick with those cards. Your grandson loves you and knows this is stressing you out but it really needs to be done now for everyone's sake.

I will do my best, dearDon't worry about a thing.
Heading to the store right away and we'll sort everything out as fast as possible.
See you soon, stay safe too. Love you.
Love you too, Grandpa. See you soon with those gift cards ready to go. Your grandson is grateful for all your help and support. Stay safe on your way to the store!

I will be carefulDon't worry about me.
Heading out now and we'll talk as soon as this is taken care of.
Love you too, dear grandson. See you shortly.
Great, Grandpa. Be careful and get back here fast once it's done. Your grandson can't wait to resolve this and put everything right. Love you!

I will hurry back as soon as I canPromise.
Love you too, dear grandson. See you soon.
Thanks, Grandpa. Hurry back when you're ready and we'll take care of it together. Your grandson is counting on you. Love you!

On my way nowWill hurry back.
Love you too, dear grandson. Stay safe until I return.
Stay safe, Grandpa. See you soon with everything sorted out. Your grandson appreciates all your help and support. Love you!

I will stay safeHeading to the store now.
Love you too, dear grandson. See you shortly.
